title: "It is unfair": Bollywood singer Shaan slams use of AI for cloning veteran singers' voices for new songs, covers

content:

title: US Judge says Google can keep Chrome, but 'exclusive deals' are a no-go
description: U.S. District Judge Amit Mehta's ruling delivers a ruling that has evolved due to the inclusion of "general artificial intelligence."
content:
What you need to know
Today (Sep 2), U.S. Judge Amit Mehta's ruling says that Google will not have to divest Chrome or Android in its antitrust case regarding its online search monopoly.

title: The AI Pioneer Trying to Save Artificial Intelligence From Big Tech
description: Ashish Vaswani helped usher in modern AI. Now he’s wondering if we’re doing it all wrong.

title: The connected customer
description: As brands compete for increasingly price conscious consumers, customer experience (CX) has become a decisive differentiator. Yet many struggle to deliver, constrained by outdated systems, fragmented data, and organizational silos that limit both agility and consistency. title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Historic Partnership Elevates Assamese Language in AI Database
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Historic Partnership Elevates Assamese Language in AI Database
description: A collaboration between two Guwahati NGOs and IIT Bombay's BharatGen AI initiative aims to elevate the Assamese language in artificial intelligence databases. This partnership, part of the 'Digitising Assam' project, incorporates two million Assamese language pages into BharatGen, significantly advancing AI readiness for this low-resource language.
content:
In a landmark move, two Guwahati-based NGOs have teamed up with IIT Bombay's BharatGen AI initiative to incorporate the Assamese language into the artificial intelligence database, according to an official announcement on Wednesday.
The organizations... [618 chars]

title: Australia's central bank exploring how AI can affect economy, governor says
description: Australia's central bank is exploring how emerging technologies like artificial intelligence could influence the economy, with possible implications for inflation and the labour market, its governor said on Wednesday.
